title: The.Tour.The.Legend.Of.The.Race.PDTV.x264-W4F.mp4
description:
The.Tour.The.Legend.of.the.Race.PDTV.x264-W4F


   The Legend of the Tour De France celebrates the last 100 editions of  
  the Tour, one of the world's most popular sporting events. The Tour   
  has lived through over a century of rich history, with ups and        
  downs, triumphs and scandals, continually evolving with the times.    
  Throughout it all, one key characteristic has remained, the           
  incredible connection the public has with the Tour cyclists,          
  mythical figures that seem accessible and inaccessible at the same    
  time.                                                                 
                                                                        
    This film tells its story through a selection of its emblematic       
  heroes, embodying their generation: Coppi, Bobet, Anquetil,           
  Poulidor, Merckx, Hinault, Indurain, Wiggins, Armstrong...            
                                                                        
    Fully archive-based and colorized, the film weaves together these     
  individual stories with the story of the Tour de France itself,       
  creating a timeless and epic sports saga.
